about_the_game:
Blast into the future with this new ultra-modern EDM and techno infused pack from TK. Projects. Upbeat, energetic, full of fast-paced tracks for boss battles, openings, lush, chill tracks for Fields, this pack is a full on synth attack that will surely find a home in your post-modern / futuristic games!

Features:

* 22 BGM, 17 ME, 10 BGS, 63 SE for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Cyberpunk Music for futuristic fantasy, modern adventure and much more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

BGM:

1. FCPC1_BGM01_Opening1_Lavateinn
